main event: Multiple observations of a green fireball over various locations in New Mexico, reported on December 4, 1949.
interesting points: Witnesses described the fireball as bright green and marble-sized at arm's length, It was observed both from the ground and from aircraft, The phenomenon lasted for only a few seconds, Witnesses included civilians and military personnel, Reports indicate that the fireball exhibited rapid changes in direction and speed.
witness description: Civilians and military personnel, including pilots and a deputy sheriff.
